title: Tellado Realty divests its hospitality business to StayVista
description: Tellado Realty has sold its hospitality business to villa rental brand StayVista, which will offer fully-serviced stays at Tellado's villa establishments in Goa. This partnership enables Tellado to concentrate on building luxury villas while StayVista takes over operations and management.
